mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE PCODE=#{pcode} ORDER BY PQDATE DESC)A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE PCODE=#{pcode}
